ResearchProjectDef.label: Solar Pollution Pump
ResearchProjectDef.description: Our perfect technologies cannot thrive in imperfect universe. We have to cleanse the mechanoid filth from the soil surrounding us.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Quasar Pollution Pump
ResearchProjectDef.description: Our growing proficiency with the more advanced materials make it easier for us to effectively clean the planet.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Tenebral Pollution Pump
ResearchProjectDef.description: With Tenebrite at our disposal cleansing the earth is fast and furiously efficient.

ResearchProjectDef.label: basic solar mechtech
ResearchProjectDef.description: The technology needed for your mechanitor to create and control basic-tier mechanoids with solar technology.

ResearchProjectDef.label: standard solar mechtech
ResearchProjectDef.description: The technology needed for your mechanitor to create and control standard-tier mechanoids with solar technology.\n\nYou can get signal chips by using a mechanitor to summon a diabolus threat.

ResearchProjectDef.label: high solar mechtech
ResearchProjectDef.description: The technology needed for your mechanitor to create and control high-tier mechanoids with solar technology.\n\nYou can get powerfocus chips by using a mechanitor to summon a war queen threat.

ResearchProjectDef.label: ultra solar mechtech
ResearchProjectDef.description: The advanced technology needed for your mechanitor to create and control ultra-tier mechanoids with solar technology, including large mechs and ultra-tier mechanitor gear.\n\nYou can get nano structuring chips by using a mechanitor to summon an apocriton threat.

ResearchProjectDef.label: basic kwazaari mechtech
ResearchProjectDef.description: The technology needed for your mechanitor to create and control basic-tier mechanoids with kwazaari technology.

ResearchProjectDef.label: standard kwazaari mechtech
ResearchProjectDef.description: The technology needed for your mechanitor to create and control standard-tier mechanoids with kwazaari technology.\n\nYou can get signal chips by using a mechanitor to summon a diabolus threat.

ResearchProjectDef.label: high kwazaari mechtech
ResearchProjectDef.description: The technology needed for your mechanitor to create and control high-tier mechanoids with kwazaari technology.\n\nYou can get powerfocus chips by using a mechanitor to summon a war queen threat.

ResearchProjectDef.label: ultra kwazaari mechtech
ResearchProjectDef.description: The advanced technology needed for your mechanitor to create and control ultra-tier mechanoids with kwazaari technology, including large mechs and ultra-tier mechanitor gear.\n\nYou can get nano structuring chips by using a mechanitor to summon an apocriton threat.

ResearchProjectDef.label: basic tenebral mechtech
ResearchProjectDef.description: The technology needed for your mechanitor to create and control basic-tier mechanoids with tenebral technology.

ResearchProjectDef.label: standard tenebral mechtech
ResearchProjectDef.description: The technology needed for your mechanitor to create and control standard-tier mechanoids with tenebral technology.\n\nYou can get signal chips by using a mechanitor to summon a diabolus threat.

ResearchProjectDef.label: high tenebral mechtech
ResearchProjectDef.description: The technology needed for your mechanitor to create and control high-tier mechanoids with tenebral technology.\n\nYou can get powerfocus chips by using a mechanitor to summon a war queen threat.

ResearchProjectDef.label: ultra tenebral mechtech
ResearchProjectDef.description: The advanced technology needed for your mechanitor to create and control ultra-tier mechanoids with tenebral technology, including large mechs and ultra-tier mechanitor gear.\n\nYou can get nano structuring chips by using a mechanitor to summon an apocriton threat.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Wasteful Tier 1 Refining
ResearchProjectDef.description: Devise alternative processing methods that are twice as fast, but will in turn produce a lot of waste.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Wasteful Tier II refining
ResearchProjectDef.description: Devise new processing methods, producing a lot of waste in exchange for speed.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Wasteful Tier III Refining
ResearchProjectDef.description: Devise new refining methods that produce twice as fast but produce a lot of waste.
